snippet.title: EMMA : Lost In Memories - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Here it is, finally, the official Trailer for EMMA: Lost In Memories.

Out since August 16th for Steam, AppStore and Google Play.

EMMA is a puzzle platformer game with a poetic and delicate story made by SandBloom Studio, creators of Sold O2ut. 

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1124960/EMMA_Lost_in_Memories/
AppStore link: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/emma-action-adventure-game/id1464138741#
PlayStore link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sandbloomstudio.emma

Check out our website: http://emma.sandbloomstudio.com/ 
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Trailer made by Gabriel Jiménez Cabrera, https://twitter.com/NeroSaution. 
Music by Naoya Sakamata: https://soundcloud.com/naoya-sakamata/emotional-sad-piano-music
You should check them out!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Aquí está, después de tanto tiempo, trailer oficial de EMMA: Lost in Memories.

Sale para Steam, AppStore and Google Play.

EMMA es un juego de puzzles y plataformas con una historia poética y delicada hecho por SandBloom Studio, creadores de Sold O2ut. 

Añadelo a tus deseados en Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1124960/EMMA_Lost_in_Memories/

Visita nuestra web: http://emma.sandbloomstudio.com/ 
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/SandBloomStudio
Facebook:
https://facebook.com/SandBloomStudio/
Instagram:
https://instagram.com/sandbloomstudio/
